sentences.en: Brumbach's voice is less explosive , almost regretful, sad in its steadiness.
sentences.cn: 布伦巴赫的声音里减少了火药味, 几乎带些懊悔的口气, 于平稳中见到些悲哀.

sentences.en: Cross test and repeated test showed that DIGFA had better specificity and steadiness.
sentences.cn: 交叉试验与重复试验结果显示DIGFA具有较好的特异性及稳定性.

sentences.en: Flavour of the past touches my soul, because that represents the broadness and steadiness of history.
sentences.cn: 旧去的味道让我的灵魂感动, 因为那是历史的博大和厚重.

sentences.en: He trusted her clear steadiness that she would do what she said.
sentences.cn: 他相信她绝对说得出做得到.

sentences.en: Individuals with fixed sign understand that steadiness is important.
sentences.cn: 固定个性的人相信稳定是很重要的.

sentences.en: It was this steadiness and loyalty to her comrades that most appealed to the British officers who later agreed to train her to become an SOE agent.
sentences.cn: 正是这种坚持稳定和对同志的忠诚打动了那位英国军官，成为他后来同意将她训练为一名特别行动处特工的最重要原因。

sentences.en: Lead - calcium tin alloy provides electrode steadiness and utmost gassing - removing.
sentences.cn: 铅一钙一锡合金确保极板的稳定性,以及最大程度抑掣气体的产生.

sentences.en: Making our enterprise become to the steadiness, vigour, strongest and bigness.
sentences.cn: 实现产品多元化,把企业做稳 、 做活 、 做强、做大.

sentences.en: On the contrary, the political system will lose its steadiness.
sentences.cn: 反之, 则出现政治体系的不稳定.

sentences.en: Steadiness and firmness were the most outstanding characters of Zhang Jian.
sentences.cn: 持重与稳健是张謇性格中最突出的特征.

sentences.en: The algorithm has steadiness in precision and formulation in program algorithm.
sentences.cn: 该方法具有精度稳定性好,编程算法简洁的特点.

sentences.en: The features affected by family environment are intelligence, steadiness, excitability, perseverance, courage, sensitivity and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 受家庭环境影响的人格特质为:聪慧性 、 稳定性 、 恃强性 、 兴奋性、有恒性 、 敢为性 、 敏感性和怀疑性.

sentences.en: The result shows that the algorithm has good convergence and steadiness.
sentences.cn: 仿真结果表明这种方法具有较好的收敛性与稳定性.

sentences.en: The risk occurrence in futures market not only harm the benefit of investors, but also harm the steadiness of the futures market.
sentences.cn: 期货市场风险的发生，严重损害了投资者的利益，对期货市场的稳定造成了极大的危害。

sentences.en: The tension take - up is controlled by the regulating valve which ensures steadiness and reliability force.
sentences.cn: 收线张力由调压阀调节,保证张力恒定可靠.

sentences.en: This paper studied emphatically the heat steadiness of naphthaline and compatibility of naphthaline with carbon steel.
sentences.cn: 本文着重对萘的热稳定性以及碳钢萘间的相容性进行实验研究。

sentences.en: This paperdiscussed the effects of change of body CG and steadiness to soccertechniqu.
sentences.cn: 本文着重从理论上探讨人体重心与稳度关系变化对足球技术的影响.

sentences.en: Under those conditions he observed steadiness and to rank them.
sentences.cn: 就在这样的情形下,他观察马儿的稳定性,并以此来评定它们的等级.
